title: BOSCH BMP585 Barometric Pressure Sensor | New Product Brief - New Products - All About Circuits
summary: The Bosch BMP585 Barometric Pressure Sensor is a highly accurate and reliable pressure sensing solution. It features an absolute accuracy of plus or minus 50 Pascals and a temperature coefficient offset of plus or minus 0.5 Pascals per degree Kelvin. The sensor is designed with a gel-filled cavity, providing robust protection against water, chemicals, and other liquids.

title: thyssenkrupp Uhde and Johnson Matthey providing technologies for ammonia plant in Turkey - ChemEngOnline
summary: thyssenkrupp Uhde and Johnson Matthey will provide İGSAŞ with a new ammonia converter cartridge for their ammonia plant in Turkey. The new cartridge is designed to significantly reduce pressure in the synthesis loop while maintaining the plant's nameplate capacity. The improved reliability of the plant and the energy savings will be achieved by combining the new thyssenkrupp Uhde ammonia converter cartridge with Johnson Matthey’s high-performance catalyst.

title: Golden Age confirms construction company for second Glen Waverley offering - Architecture and Design
summary: Golden Age Group has begun construction on Floret, a 77-townhouse project in Glen Waverley, designed by Rothelowman and built by Figurehead. The townhomes are designed to blend into the streetscape and cater to the demand for high-end design in the area. Construction is expected to be completed in 2025.
